author: Robert Orben

quote: I've always liked Atlanta. And not just for the strip clubs, but the shopping and the food.
author: Jon Stewart

quote: Everyone prefers some foods over others, but some adults take this tendency to an extreme. These people tend to prefer the kinds of bland food they may have enjoyed as children - such as plain or buttered pasta, macaroni and cheese, cheese pizza, French fries and grilled cheese sandwiches - and to restrict their eating to just a few dishes.
author: Andrew Weil

quote: I'm not an amazing cook. But I can follow a recipe!
author: Rachel McAdams

quote: I get up just before six and come downstairs, put food out for the cats, and open the cat flap. Then I work out for 35 or 40 minutes - I have a very large bathroom with an elliptical cross-trainer and a bicycle.
author: Ruth Rendell

quote: I said that if I were an industrialist or entrepreneur, I would invest in agriculture-based enterprises, for there is so much that can be done in manufacturing, in food preservation.
author: F. Sionil Jose

quote: I'm a big fan of Caribbean food, Spanish food, Dominican food - like rice and beans. Hot sauce just adds a different layer of boom to the food, you feel me?
author: Theophilus London

quote: I wanted to get away from the Mexican vernacular and do more 'nuevo Latino.' Americans are starting to understand regionality in Mexican food. It is very regional in terms of ingredients.
author: Aaron Sanchez

quote: I am a junk food eater.
author: Anthony Scaramucci

quote: When we go to the store, we bring home more than food - we bring home traces of broader environmental problems. But we can use our shopping carts and dinner plates to help solve some of those problems.
author: Frances Beinecke

quote: I do a lot of reading about food and the food industry, so I try to eat locally and go to the farmer's market.
author: Nikki Reed

quote: I think America's food culture is embedded in fast-food culture. And the real question that we have is: How are we going to teach slow-food values in a fast-food world? Of course, it's very, very difficult to do, especially when children have grown up eating fast food and the values that go with that.
author: Alice Waters

quote: The most appealing thing to me about food is combining and layering flavors, tastes, and textures. So the perfect sandwich has to be toasted. It has to have Emmenthal Swiss cheese and a combination of sweet and savory - some cranberry or fig thing happening - with different kinds of meats like Black Forest ham and roast beef.
author: Kyle MacLachlan

quote: Peruvian food is so simple yet amazingly flavored with their traditional spices.
author: L'Wren Scott

quote: My husband is Dutch, and his family, when you sat down to eat food at the table, you never left the table until you ate living bread and drank living water. They never left the table until they'd read Scripture together. So morning, lunch, suppertime, Scripture was always read at the table, and then there was prayer to close.
author: Ann Voskamp

quote: If you can't afford organic food and are unable to grow your own, it's crucial to wash all inorganic produce very carefully to minimize the toxins you consume. Soak everything for 20 minutes in water with vinegar and salt or water with fresh lemon juice and salt.
author: Suzanne Somers

quote: I have no taste for corruptible food nor for the pleasures of this life. I desire the Bread of God, which is the Flesh of Jesus Christ, who was of the seed of David, and for drink I desire His Blood, which is love incorruptible.
author: Ignatius of Antioch

quote: When you're trying to lose weight, one of the most important things you can do is eat three decent meals a day so that you're not so hungry that you can't get food off your mind. Habit and hunger have long been the basic, insidious enemies of the overweight. We can't fight hunger, but we can fight habit.
author: Jean Nidetch

quote: Ultimately, the perfect meal is when those things come together - circumstance, the food, ambiance, and you're with the person that you want to be with.
author: Grant Achatz

quote: I really loved traveling the U.S. and seeing regional differences within the same country and how the same ingredients are used in very different ways. I love how the 'old guard' of cuisine are still pioneering so much of the direction of food today.
author: Johnny Iuzzini

quote: When you love food as much as I do, staying healthy is not easy. I mean, moderation, not deprivation. That's my new way of living. I always want more and that's just my life.
author: Carnie Wilson

quote: When my work gets crazy, I make sure to always have vitamins, water and proper food with me. That has helped me to lose 33 pounds.
author: Carnie Wilson

quote: There is so much more vegetable use in Thailand, India and China than meat. Yes, when you go to the markets or buy street food, you see shrimp or chicken - but mostly vegetables.
author: Jean-Georges Vongerichten

quote: What's my favorite food besides pancakes? I guess it would be flapjacks, followed closely by hotcakes. After that, crepes... but thick crepes. Y'know, like, pancake-thick.
author: Rob Riggle

quote: I'm not a machine. I get really motivated, then I fall off the wagon and want to eat Chinese food and sit on my couch and gain five or 10 pounds!
author: Shemar Moore

quote: Ultimately, the bread and butter of McDonald's is delivering great service, great quality food, at affordable prices day in and day out.
author: Steve Easterbrook

quote: In the Seventies, my children played in the street, read politically incorrect stories, ate home-cooked food and occasional junk and, yes, were sometimes smacked.
author: Laurie Graham

quote: What I've been developing is a vegan fast food chain and vegan food markets.
author: Heather Mills

quote: Find combinations of flavors you love and buy the best quality ingredients you can afford. Your food is only going to be as good as the sum of its parts, like anything else.
author: Gail Simmons

quote: I look at fitness as a necessity in the same way as how you drink water, eat food, one should look at fitness in a dedicated way. People will look fresh and happy. If you are happy, you in a way look fit.
author: Arjun Rampal

quote: Like most actors, I've always been grateful for Chinese restaurants; they were often the only places that stayed open late enough for performers to get hot food after the show.
author: Ginger Rogers

quote: In Judaism, almost every ritual entails either food or the absence of food. Yom Kippur, for instance, is the absence of food. Part of it is Talmudic, part of it is custom. So much of Judaism was bound up in dietary laws. So everything you ate - the very act itself - was part of religion.
author: Gil Marks

quote: I'm a little self-conscious about my body. I love to wear hoodies because you can get cozy and eat some food and your belly doesn't show!
author: Jared Padalecki

quote: I think the biggest thing is clean as you go. Wash all your knives, cutting boards, dishes, when you are done cooking, not look at a sink full of dishes after you are done. Cleaning as you go helps keep away cross contamination and you avoid having food borne bacteria.
author: Cat Cora

quote: Food is all about balance; it is all about taste.
author: Michael Mina

quote: Zombies let us explore notions of the apocalypse - no water, food, medical care, the government imploding - while letting us sleep at night.
author: Max Brooks

quote: I work out like a maniac, three times more than anything I did in the past. I am off carbs, salt, sweets, and live on a fish diet. And I promise I am not going to indulge in food again. See, when I was 49 years old, I was fine, but the moment I touched 50, I felt that something within me had changed drastically. My metabolic rate dropped.
author: Sanjay Dutt

quote: I did a dance sequence in my second short film, which was my best short film, called 'Hairway to the Stars,' and I think Chris Wink, the founder of Blue Man Group, was in that. It's a black-and-white dance sequence. We were Glorious Food waiters together.
author: David O. Russell

quote: We might be shifting away from a Eurocentric view of the United States into something that's much more multicultural, multinational, and Chinese food is just one slice of that.
author: Jennifer Lee

quote: When I'm out, maybe I'm looking at the fried chicken, but I know I need to order the grilled. But I'm still from the country. I love my fried food and my neck bones and all that, too.
author: Adrian Peterson

quote: I made the connection between food and weight, but feeling good or bad was a separate issue.
author: Robin Quivers

quote: I did a film when I was about 30; it's a coming of age story called 'Gas Food Lodging,' and I'm so proud of that little independent film. I play this young English geologist, and he's such a simple, loving kind of guy. Doesn't talk too much. He's just a quiet guy, and he gets the girl.
author: Robert Knepper

quote: I'm learning to hunt with rifles, because if you think about it, hunting gets you the healthiest meat - organic, free-range food. It's a totally yuppie spin on what I thought was kind of a redneck occupation.
author: Sarah Wayne Callies

quote: My food hero has to be Auguste Escoffier. And the villain? The man who's been most responsible for the death of food in my time is Ronald McDonald. He's always scared me, I think he's evil - he's a wolf in sheep's clothing. Him and the Hamburglar.
author: Arthur Potts Dawson

quote: When I eat cilantro, it's like someone sprayed perfume down my throat. It closes up my throat, even if there's only a little piece. I like Mexican food, and I'll go out to a Mexican restaurant and tell them, 'Look, I will die if you get cilantro in my food.' Then there's always that one little piece that falls in, and I gag.
author: Amber Rose

quote: If we eat any food, or drink any beverage, we must recite a blessing over them before and after.
author: Shmuel Yosef Agnon

quote: Healthy, sustainable food production methods give us food that is nutritionally better and with fewer pesticides, antibiotics, and hormones.
author: Marion Nestle

quote: My weaknesses have always been food and men - in that order.
author: Dolly Parton

quote: More die in the United States of too much food than of too little.
author: John Kenneth Galbraith

quote: I haven't eaten at a McDonald's since I became President.
author: William J. Clinton

quote: I do like going out and finding free food. I've done it since I was a child. Fishing prawns and shrimps from the sea is wonderful, as is picking blackberries, sloes and mushrooms. Having a guide while out looking for mushrooms is really important, though, as picking the wrong type can be quite dangerous.
author: Mary Berry

quote: When I started, you had cochineal food colouring that would turn things pink, but you could never make it red. Now, red is no problem - and if you look at supermarket bakery sections since 'Bake Off' began, you can get everything.
author: Mary Berry

quote: 'Potato-chip news' is news that's repetitive, requires little effort to absorb, and is consumable in massive quantities: true crime, natural disasters, political punditry, celebrity gossip, sports gossip, or endless photographs of beautiful houses, food, or clothes.
author: Gretchen Rubin

quote: For a long time, I was an assistant in the NFL to George Allen, and George was paranoid that other teams were cheating on him... that they were offering bounties, that they were wiring our locker room, that they were putting food poisoning into the pregame meal of the other team's stars, stuff like that.
author: Marv Levy

quote: Don't you have a machine that puts food into the mouth and pushes it down?
author: Nikita Khrushchev

quote: We take food for granted, but it isn't a luxury for many people.
author: Christina Aguilera

quote: I'm the person who wouldn't send back my food even if I got steak when I'd ordered fish.
author: Anna Kendrick

quote: Fast food is hugely important in the life of a comedy writer. All we do is order in, and what we're going to eat is hotly debated.
author: Mindy Kaling

quote: We must pay greater attention to keeping our bodies and minds healthy and able to heal. Yet we are making it difficult for our defences to work. We allow things to be sold that should not be called food. Many have no nutritive value and lead to obesity, salt imbalance, and allergies.
author: David Suzuki

quote: When the Nobel Peace Prize Committee designated me the recipient of the 1970 award for my contribution to the 'green revolution,' they were in effect, I believe, selecting an individual to symbolize the vital role of agriculture and food production in a world that is hungry, both for bread and for peace.
author: Norman Borlaug

quote: I love to cook comfort food. I'll make fish and vegetables or meat and vegetables and potatoes or rice. The ritual of it is fun for me, and the creativity of it.
author: Reese Witherspoon

quote: Before I started writing about food, my focus was really on the human relationship to plants. Not only do plants nourish us bodily - they nourish us psychologically.
author: Michael Pollan

quote: Every major food company now has an organic division. There's more capital going into organic agriculture than ever before.
author: Michael Pollan

quote: It was my Uncle George who discovered that alcohol was a food well in advance of modern medical thought.
author: P. G. Wodehouse

quote: Although even when I am being idle I have plenty of food for thought both early and late - thoughts both about and not about art.
author: Gustav Klimt

quote: The natural sweetness of leeks, with their soft, oniony aroma, makes them the perfect winter comfort food.
author: Yotam Ottolenghi

quote: The need for love and intimacy is a fundamental human need, as primal as the need for food, water, and air.
author: Dean Ornish

quote: With the growth of both urbanization and globalization, consumers are becoming increasingly disconnected from their food.
author: Denise Morrison

quote: All developmental activities for the common man such as education, healthcare, shelter and food distribution should be handled by reputed private sector institutions. It should be a competitive market in order to prevent the formation of monopolies.
author: N. R. Narayana Murthy

quote: Orange juice from concentrate is labeled. Food coloring Red #5 is labeled. Fish are labeled as to whether they've been previously frozen. To a consumer, there's no plausible reason why these factors should be on a food ingredient label while the presence of GMOs shouldn't be.
author: Ramez Naam

quote: I don't mind payin' for the police and for streets and sanitation, or road work, bridges, trains, food subsidies and welfare. But I don't wanna pay for bombs to fight proxy wars in the middle of nowhere against enemies in the night.
author: Lupe Fiasco

quote: If we make it national policy that we will support small farmers the way we support agribusiness, we'll suddenly see it change in terms of the cost of organic food.
author: Ruth Reichl

quote: I eat a variety of foods like vegetables, fruit and beef for protein and iron.
author: Sasha Cohen

quote: If you want to lose weight, you must make sure your appetite for life is far bigger than your appetite for mere food.
author: Karen Salmansohn

quote: My favourite thing in the world is going out to get Chinese food, then coming home and renting a movie.
author: Bindi Irwin

quote: I worked for the Office of Management and Budget in the White House, on nuclear energy policy. But I decided it would be much more fun to have a specialty food store, so I left Washington D.C. and moved to the Hamptons. And how glad I am that I did!
author: Ina Garten

quote: I love to take something ordinary and make it really special.
author: Ina Garten

quote: I don't always buy organic food. It is more expensive.
author: Alexandra Paul

quote: I love France. It's got the sun down at the bottom, the Alps for skiing, and all that wine and food.
author: Paul Hollywood

quote: Our lives are not in the lap of the gods, but in the lap of our cooks.
author: Lin Yutang

quote: Growing up, dinner was when we would sit down, the whole family, and we would talk about our days and just create memories with one another. Now some of my favorite memories are eating and making food with my son.
author: Tia Mowry

quote: I loved everything about Spain - the people, the language, and the food!
author: Karlie Kloss

quote: In America, I would say New York and New Orleans are the two most interesting food towns. In New Orleans, they don't have a bad deli. There's no mediocrity accepted.
author: Mario Batali

quote: Food is so important - it sustains us, it provides a social focal point, and it is fun. I cannot unravel the difference between love in my family and the preparation of food because they are so closely woven.
author: Adriana Trigiani

quote: Being a food show and being me, I always kicked it up a notch, which means I would always elevate the spice level or the complexity of a particular dish. So, it was always like we're going to kick this up a little bit.
author: Emeril Lagasse

quote: If I had the choice between smoked salmon and tinned salmon, I'd have it tinned. With vinegar.
author: Harold Wilson

quote: I rode 300 miles through the forest and ate all sorts of strange food. And every time 'Torak' did something new, like swimming with killer whales or kayaking, I thought I'd better go and do it.
author: Michelle Paver

quote: A food's value is based on how good it tastes.
author: Homaro Cantu

quote: In a lot of ways, a lot of smells that aren't necessarily edible smell good, and they remind you of certain aspects of food. So making those associations with what smells good or smells a certain way and pairing that with actual edible ingredients is one avenue that we take creatively.
author: Grant Achatz

quote: While I may never be in remission from cancer, I am currently in remission from an unhealthy relationship to food.
author: Kris Carr

quote: I'm a terrific Mexican cook, and I just love Mexican food. And I love cooking Mexican food.
author: Eva Longoria

quote: I live out of cans a lot. But I try to indulge only in healthy canned food.
author: Dwight Yoakam

quote: It just happens in life, where you resonate with a particular artist. Or it can be a kind of food or a fashion - you discover it and it gives you a whole new lease on life.
author: Steve Vai

quote: However, as a parent, as a grandparent, as a former educator, I know that these practices alone when we are dealing with young children are insufficient. We will never control this rising epidemic without greater accountability from the food industry.
author: Bob Filner

quote: I think I went to Italy initially for the art, architecture, food and history, but I stayed there because of the people in Cortona.
author: Frances Mayes

quote: Miss Child is never bashful with butter.
author: Phil Donahue

quote: When I'm not on the road, I try to intake about 300 grams of protein a day, which is a lot. I got really into how your body absorbs it and how you feel and how crazy it is when you intake that much food and actually feel better, your brain works better, and you actually lose weight even though you're eating more. It's so methodical.
author: Albert Hammond, Jr.

quote: If you are ever at a loss to support a flagging conversation, introduce the subject of eating.
author: Leigh Hunt

quote: I'm a home cook and love to read about food, but I'm not trained as a chef. I'm just really into cooking and passionate about it.
author: Ted Allen

quote: I pile on the weight when I work. All that location catering's not good for the love handles. I lose a bit when I'm not working, but I love my food and the occasional snifter.
author: Ray Winstone

quote: That's a big goal of mine, to try and grow as much of my own food as possible.
author: Daryl Hannah

quote: I like to add props to render the specificities of place - paintings, food, clothing, signs, infrastructure, music, sayings and slang particular to the region and particular to the character. And props shouldn't just sit there; they should get used.
author: Kaui Hart Hemmings

quote: There's the Hollywood sign; there's Griffith Observatory; there's the great, amazing Los Angeles Basin. It's 465 square miles of insanity and the best food on the planet.
author: Robert Crais

quote: My Mom always cooked healthy. Greek food lends itself to cooking healthy.
author: Cat Cora

quote: The use of food metaphors is really well established English... Somebody is a peach, a hot tamale.
author: Erin McKean

quote: Honestly, I just try to live right, get enough sleep, and drink a lot of water. I do drink a lot of water; I do live by that. And just eating good clean food... I do love all of it. But I do definitely try to eat better organic food.
author: Keshia Knight Pulliam

quote: I eat a lot of pizza and really unhealthy food.
author: Bella Hadid

quote: Food can become such a point of anxiety - not because it's food, but just because you have anxiety. That's how eating disorders develop.
author: Vanessa Carlton

quote: It's easy for Americans to forget that the food they eat doesn't magically appear on a supermarket shelf.
author: Christopher Dodd

quote: Workers want to be paid an honest, fair wage for the work they do. They want to be able to provide for their families by being justly compensated for their part in helping grow the U.S. economy. They deserve to be able to put food on the table and receive health care and other benefits.
author: James P. Hoffa

quote: A healthy mind and body are essential. No excesses. Proper food. The body is like a Rolls-Royce. With care, it could last 200 years. It's a dynamo; the more you use it, the more you recharge it.
author: Oleg Cassini

quote: My best friend was Aboriginal. She taught me about 'bush tucker' - the food of the land, the different things you could eat if you got lost in the bush, like grasses and berries. There's this tree called the billygoat plum - the fruit is quite nice.
author: Isabel Lucas

quote: Talking up a storm about food is so easy for me, it's second nature.
author: Rocco DiSpirito

quote: Food is your body's fuel. Without fuel, your body wants to shut down.
author: Ken Hill

quote: If you love a man, immediately you will reduce your intake of food - it's automatic.
author: Pierre Dukan

quote: Every year, the average American eats as much as 33 pounds of cheese. That's up to 60,000 calories and 3,100 grams of saturated fat. So why do we eat so much cheese? Mainly it's because the government is in cahoots with the processed food industry.
author: Michael Moss

quote: You can never have too much ketchup, 'cause it's a food group.
author: David Eigenberg

quote: The less food, the more time to talk, the more to talk about.
author: Damon Wayans

quote: I love food and I love living.
author: Ali Landry

quote: I am not Jewish, but I think that America invented nothing so fine as deli food.
author: Mike Newell

quote: I would say, stay the hell away from the party scene. Anything you put in front of your goal, and especially something like that, whether it's too much gambling, too much food, too much cold beers on the weekend - anything that you put in front of the prize is going to end up getting in the way and hurting you in the end.
author: Brad Renfro

quote: I follow my own advice: eat less, move more, eat lots of fruits, vegetables, and grains, and don't eat too much junk food. It leaves plenty of flexibility for eating an occasional junk food.
author: Marion Nestle

quote: It seems everyone wants to know if I have an eating disorder, and playing an anorexic character on 'Make it or Break It' probably didn't help much. To set the record straight, I certainly do not have an eating disorder. I think as anyone can gather, I love food, and it is not just a front to cover up the fact that I don't eat any.
author: Alice Greczyn

quote: The disparity between a restaurant's price and food quality rises in direct proportion to the size of the pepper mill.
author: Bryan Q. Miller

quote: Men do not have to cook their food; they do so for symbolic reasons to show they are men and not beasts.
author: Edmund Leach

quote: Never order food in excess of your body weight.
author: Erma Bombeck

quote: I hid myself in food.
author: Gordon Ramsay

quote: Is Elizabeth Taylor fat? Her favorite food is seconds.
author: Joan Rivers

quote: If you're going to America, bring your own food.
author: Fran Lebowitz

quote: The only kind of seafood I trust is the fish stick, a totally featureless fish that doesn't have eyeballs or fins.
author: Dave Barry

quote: I love food and feel that it is something that should be enjoyed. I eat whatever I want. I just don't overeat.
author: Tyra Banks

quote: I mainly cook British food with a few things I've had on my holidays. I went to the Canary Islands a few years ago, and we had all sorts of different mushrooms on brioche with pancetta on top, and it was delicious. I had it most days for lunch, so I thought, 'I'll do that when I get back,' and now it's in my cookbook, an absolute favourite.
author: Mary Berry

quote: I love oatmeal. To me, it's not boring. I agree that ordinary oatmeal is very boring, but not the steel-cut Irish kind - the kind that pops in your mouth when you bite into it in little glorious bursts like a sort of gummy champagne.
author: Alan Alda

quote: An almost forgotten means of economic self-reliance is the home production of food. We are too accustomed to going to stores and purchasing what we need.
author: Ezra Taft Benson

quote: Understand, when you eat meat, that something did die. You have an obligation to value it - not just the sirloin but also all those wonderful tough little bits.
author: Anthony Bourdain

quote: If food were free, why work?
author: Douglas Horton

quote: I'm a healthy eater, but I don't consider Chick-fil-A fast food.
author: Kehlani

quote: Italy will always have the best food.
author: Diane von Furstenberg

quote: When I eat with my friends, it is a moment of real pleasure, when I really enjoy my life.
author: Monica Bellucci

quote: Maybe a person's time would be as well spent raising food as raising money to buy food.
author: Frank A. Clark

quote: Sugar-free ice pops are an invention of God. They hardly have any calories since they're mostly water. I eat about 15 pops every two days.
author: Gene Simmons

quote: You can't make a souffle rise twice.
author: Alice Roosevelt Longworth

quote: Ever notice that Soup for One is eight aisles away from Party Mix?
author: Elayne Boosler

quote: Every two months, I allow myself a splurge day where I eat thick, doughy pizza from Pizzeria Uno or an ice cream sundae from my store with birthday-cake ice cream, Marshmallow Fluff, and toppings mixed in.
author: Dylan Lauren

quote: People in Slow Food understand that food is an environmental issue.
author: Michael Pollan

quote: An anthropologist will not excitedly report of a newly discovered tribe: 'They eat food! They breathe air! They use tools! They tell each other stories!' We humans forget how alike we are, living in a world that only reminds us of our differences.
author: Eliezer Yudkowsky

quote: The food that enters the mind must be watched as closely as the food that enters the body.
author: Pat Buchanan

quote: Health food may be good for the conscience but Oreos taste a hell of a lot better.
author: Robert Redford

quote: I always preferred my father's pasta the next day, when he'd put it in a hot oven with heaps of extra cheese. It would emerge slightly burned and very crisp on top.
author: Yotam Ottolenghi

quote: Multinational food companies can play a large role in helping to prevent chronic diseases around the world by offering healthier choices in the United States and abroad.
author: Dean Ornish

quote: I always suggest something fast and simple so you have more time to share with friends; and when we think of the ultimate food to serve for a football game, only one thing comes to mind - wings!
author: Marcus Samuelsson

quote: Know how to garnish food so that it is more appealing to the eye and even more flavorful than before.
author: Marilyn vos Savant

quote: The secret of food lies in memory - of thinking and then knowing what the taste of cinnamon or steak is.
author: Jerry Saltz

quote: The body doesn't accept the lack of food, and it suffers from the temptation of food and from other aspects which gnaw at it perpetually. The body fights back sure enough, but at the end of the day, everything returns to the primary consideration - that is, the mind.
author: Bobby Sands

quote: Worrying about bills, food, or other problems leaves less capacity to think ahead or to exert self-discipline. So, poverty imposes a mental tax.
author: Nicholas Kristof

quote: Our goal was to show people a vision of food they hadn't seen before. So, I had this idea of... let's cut all these things in half, and show a picture of the food in the pan, in the oven.
author: Nathan Myhrvold

quote: I don't have a dime left. I am dependent on my friends for food and a small old-age pension.
author: Bela Lugosi

quote: I don't do much cooking because it's impossible when you travel so much. You go grocery shopping, buy everything, and then get a call to fly out for two weeks. By the time you're back, all the food is rotten.
author: Winnie Harlow

quote: A 10-pound sack of potatoes lasts a long time.
author: Octavia E. Butler

quote: Our minds are like our stomaches; they are whetted by the change of their food, and variety supplies both with fresh appetite.
author: Quintilian

quote: Our biggest fear is that 'Food, Inc.' will move heavy-handed food-safety regulations forward.
author: Joel Salatin

quote: It's hard to come into a new relationship with food unless you're engaged in an interactive way at an early age; it's hard to change your values.
author: Alice Waters

quote: An Englishman teaching an American about food is like the blind leading the one-eyed.
author: A. J. Liebling

quote: We have been growing more food than we need since the '60s... what we have is a terrible distribution problem.
author: Kimbal Musk

quote: Well, first of all, we've got to get away from being offended by the truth. We've seen a 41 percent increase in food stamp recipients across the United States of America since President Obama was sworn in in January 2009. That has nothing to do with black, white, Hispanic or whatever. It's a fact, and we need to, you know, deal with that.
author: Allen West

quote: I never eat in a restaurant that's over a hundred feet off the ground and won't stand still.
author: Calvin Trillin

quote: I dream about food.
author: Tia Mowry

quote: The only think I like better than talking about Food is eating.
author: John Walters

quote: The position is: the Gaelic language is no longer the native language; it is dead, yet food is being brought to the graveyard.
author: Patrick Kavanagh

quote: I would like to find a stew that will give me heartburn immediately, instead of at three o clock in the morning.
author: John Barrymore

quote: We would load up the yellow Cutlass Supreme station wagon and pick blackberries during blackberry season or spring onions during spring onion season. For us, food was part of the fabric of our day.
author: Mario Batali

quote: I do love Italian food. Any kind of pasta or pizza. My new pig out food is Indian food. I eat Indian food like three times a week. It's so good.
author: Jennifer Love Hewitt

quote: Most vegetarians look so much like the food they eat that they can be classified as cannibals.
author: Finley Peter Dunne

quote: If somebody has a chance to put my food in their mouth, that tells the story.
author: Emeril Lagasse

quote: Music is one of those things that is constantly going in my head all the time. It's sort of like the evolution and creation of doing food, or my philosophy about wine. It's always beating in my head, so it keeps the spirit moving.
author: Emeril Lagasse

quote: I came here because the city has a tradition and is a very respected food city.
author: Emeril Lagasse

quote: I think, as a chef and restaurateur, that you have to take care of your business. Otherwise, you're only as good as your last meal. You have to watch if your food costs are too high, or you could be out of business in no time.
author: Jean-Georges Vongerichten

quote: I always say centered food equals centered behavior.
author: Marilu Henner

quote: I remember once I read a book on mental illness and there was a nurse that had gotten sick. Do you know what she died from? From worrying about the mental patients not being able to get their food. She became a mental patient.
author: Ornette Coleman

quote: I have four Rhode Island Red hens. I get two eggs from them a day. They're feathered dustbins that eat leftover food and weeds, and they're easy to look after - I throw some grain at them in the morning, take the eggs and that's it. I love the sound of clucking.
author: Deborah Moggach

quote: Attitudes toward food have completely changed.
author: Giada De Laurentiis

quote: I tried to bake a cake for my mother's birthday - it took me four hours. It was terrible, and I cried for three days.
author: Rachael Ray

quote: The worst vice of the solitary is the worship of his food.
author: Cyril Connolly

quote: South Korea's economy is still difficult. I will create a country where nobody worries about putting food on the table.
author: Park Geun-hye

quote: I can make dressing - or stuffing. Y'all call it stuffing up here, we call it dressing down there. It's really good dressing. That family recipe was passed on, and I love to make that.
author: Edie Brickell

quote: LOVE: A word properly applied to our delight in particular kinds of food; sometimes metaphorically spoken of the favorite objects of all our appetites.
author: Henry Fielding

quote: If I could only have one type of food with me, I would bring soy sauce. The reason being that if I have soy sauce, I can flavor a lot of things.
author: Martin Yan

quote: I love food. I'm a complete foodie. I love to cook. I find it very hard to say no to food. I get grumpy if I don't get food.
author: Stephen Hunter

quote: I'm from South Georgia, so my mom, she always cooked some dang good food when I was growing up.
author: Phillip Phillips

quote: If I'm making a movie and get hungry, I call time-out and eat some crackers.
author: Carol Alt

quote: Sitting down to a meal with an Indian family is different from sitting down to a meal with a British family.
author: Roland Joffe

quote: It's more than just high quality food for the family table; it's growing the food in a way that does not harm the environment. That gives me emotional well-being that is important to me.
author: Robert Patterson

quote: I think Australian food is probably some of the best in the world.
author: Karrie Webb

quote: I always knew that food and wine were vital, with my mother being Italian and a good cook.
author: Robert Mondavi

quote: I like to say, 'Chop suey's the biggest culinary joke that one culture has ever played on another,' because chop suey, if you translate into Chinese, means 'tsap sui,' which, if you translate back, means 'odds and ends.'
author: Jennifer Lee

quote: Confit is the ultimate comfort food, and trendy or not, it is dazzling stuff.
author: Sally Schneider

quote: I like to eat and I love the diversity of foods.
author: David Soul

quote: Food is a lens for culture.
author: Dana Goodyear

quote: I think for diners, it is about crafting an identity around food which we have not really had in a mainstream way in this country. So there is a mass movement of people who identify themselves through their food preferences or even just that they prioritize food - that's where we get this idea of being a foodie.
author: Dana Goodyear

quote: In '98, I locked myself in my house, went out of my mind and wrote 25 songs. I rarely bathed during that period of writing, I sent out for food, I didn't really venture out of my house in three or four months. It was a hell of an experience.
author: Jerry Cantrell

quote: Being Latina, I'm super close with my family. I love them, and I love spending time with them. I love being at my grandma's house and eating her food.
author: Emeraude Toubia

quote: On my first date, my boyfriend asked me if I wanted to eat a la carte, and I said that I would prefer to stay inside!
author: Cristin Milioti

quote: The French cook; we open tins.
author: John Galsworthy

quote: I love food and I love everything involved with food. I love the fun of it. I love restaurants. I love cooking, although I don't cook very much. I love kitchens.
author: Alma Guillermoprieto

quote: It was very important thousands of years ago to categorize things. I can eat that plant, I can't eat that plant. Or this tribe, not that tribe. We don't have to do that anymore - we have processed food now!
author: Keegan-Michael Key

quote: Eating without conversation is only stoking.
author: Marcelene Cox

quote: I know my husband really loves me because he takes me to have ribs. He says I'm the only girl he ever took out who actually ate anything on her plate, as opposed to pushing it around.
author: Julia Barr

quote: I said to my friends that if I was going to starve, I might as well starve where the food is good.
author: Virgil Thomson

quote: When we get in late and the only thing open is fast food, it can be tough to maintain a healthy diet.
author: Mike Trout

quote: I love spaghetti and meatballs... I eat a lot.
author: Susan Lucci

quote: Human beings do not eat nutrients, they eat food.
author: Mary Catherine Bateson

quote: I am not a vegetarian because I love animals; I am a vegetarian because I hate plants.
author: A. Whitney Brown

quote: Is art influential? It can be - 'Uncle Tom's Cabin' rallied abolitionists, and 'The Jungle' provoked the demand for a safer food industry.
author: Will Shetterly

quote: More than any other in Western Europe, Britain remains a country where a traveler has to think twice before indulging in the ordinary food of ordinary people.
author: Joseph Lelyveld
